website_summaries.verdict: A good choice when a large umbrella is needed, but not a practical choice for everyone.
pros: A basic umbrella in a traditional design
Features a wooden handle for easy carrying
Ideal on the beach or golf course

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This look like a good umbrella and a great deal for the price. But the fiberglass rod is very weak and I don't know if it was damaged furring shipping or not but when I got it there was a slight bend in it and within two days that slight bend turned in to a complete break and now I don't have an umbrella. Don't get an umbrella with fiberglass. They are too weak.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: In your face, rainy season!
customer_reviews.text: Great for seasonal rains. I needed it mainly for walking across school campus because the weather is bipolar here and likes to turn on a dime. It feels very sturdy. Some reviewers say it's heavy, but I can't really tell/don't really care, but I'm a fairly large man, too. Hence, why I needed a big umbrella. In my experience so far, I think I can say this: if you don't need an umbrella EVERY day, and just those times when it's really rainy, this is perfect for you. I know I'm very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber

customer_reviews.title: Big, comfy, and sturdy in the wind, at a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I confess that I bought this umbrella, largely because it's blue and white, and therefore matches my car. The umbrella is large, but it fits nicely in the storage compartment under the trunk floor of my X5. We've used it a few times, so I know the large size (like any golf umbrella) covers two people comfortably. And it seems sturdy in the wind. For less than $20, you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Russom

customer_reviews.title: big sturdy umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is what you need on a rainy day, and we've had plenty of those this year. It's big enough for two, and it opens easily and closes easily. two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: kay e landers

customer_reviews.title: It's better than the price.
customer_reviews.text: I think i paid $14-$16 for it, and it's been great. It covers a lot of space and the colors are nice. You can easily fit two people beneath it and keep dry, and the material seems sturdy and wouldn't rip easily. I was skeptical because it was so cheap, and i've never shopped for an umbrella before so i didn't really know what to expect. I'm happy with the buy and think it was definitely worth it. I would've given it 4 1/2 stars because the pole material seems a little flimsy (it's plastic), but overall it works great and so far has held up under light winds at least. It'll probably last you years.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is a great purchase. It's solid and sturdy and holds up well against heavy winds. Big enough for two people to stay dry with no problems. For the price, I would very impressed. I will definitely purchase a second one since everyone likes to grab mine on rainy days :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F

customer_reviews.title: I love this type of umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I love this type of umbrella, especially for the price! These golf umbrellas work very well as I greet students getting off the bus at school each morning. Navy and white fits in with our school colors, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is a total kick in the head. My husband and I can fit under it. I sit under it yes it's that big when I get hot when it decides to be summer here in Columbia Falls Montana. It's great when it's raining as well. It keeps All of me dry. I really it honestly. But don't open it inside your house according to an old wives myth. It will bring you bad luck!!! Or is that a broom??
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie, Montana

customer_reviews.title: This is great, and the price was right
customer_reviews.text: It has been raining a TON here this summer. I needed a bigger umbrella that my fiance and I could both use. This is great, and the price was right. It is a classic look, which is my style, and is nice quality. I've used it a few dozen times already, and it gets the job done. I suggested it to my sister to cover her and her toddler in an easy umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: violetbouregard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect golf umbrellas. We use these to help guests to and from their cars when it's raining. Great if there are two or three people that need protection. Get some if you are planning a wedding. Also perfect if you are escorting someone in a wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: Anycc

customer_reviews.title: Nice gold umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella arrived at a very fast rate and was packaged very well. I had to return it because I didn't pay attention to the fact that its not a small umbrella. I assumed it wouldn't be very big and I was totally wrong. For golf its a great umbrella but for carrying around for school I would not recommend it. When its open you can almost cover a small car with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nighttrain

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Nice golf umbrella and sturdy. Replaces an old one that I had for many years. I use it for when I go walking in the rain. I'm also glad it's a standard size - if there is such a thing... LoL.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: It looks and feels nice; just like your typical golf umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels nice; just like your typical golf umbrella. However, I have yet to use it, and the handle is already cracked. Nothing I can't fix with some duct tape, or something else, but an annoyance, right? Opens and closes easily, and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: John Kampmeier

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 months of normal usage
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is beautiful and large and we used it every few days for the short time we owned it, until the rod punctured through the top one day while we opened it. Disappointed it didn't last longer. Perhaps ours was just defective.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, got great reviews
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase, as I am not into using the compacts. This got decent reviews which is why I purchased. Have not been able to use much yet though so hoping it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Roomy for two!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gold umbrella. It is big and opens/closes efficiently. The wood handle got easily scratched but overall, I'm happy with this purchase that I plan to order another umbrella in the same size as I love the size of it. Two people can share comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Tellyjan

customer_reviews.title: Its big and works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Its big, Big, BIG!! Its exactly what I wanted. For those who complain that it is made poorly keep in mind its an umbrella for rain not intended as a force field to protect you from a hurricane. It is constructed fine for the use it is intended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased so far!!!! I've been using it only in rainy weather but will try it out in hot weather since I unfortunately don't have a car and always need constant shade so I use a umbrella!!! It hasn't "FLIPPED-UP" on me during windy times which is SOOO nice plus I'm not MAD AND EMBARRASSED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice big umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the umbrella. It opens very easily and is very strong. The colors are true to the picture. I did notice after using it only once that the wooden handle has a little crack in it. I will not send it back - need it for the April showers but wish that it had lasted a little longer than that before I noticed a defect. I only gave 3 stars because of the crack. The umbrella itself is very good. So far.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Barrientos

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great quality umbrella for the price. Arrived quickly in a giant tube like box with plenty of protection. As for the construction, It is large and sturdy! My wife and I fit perfectly under it, and it's not overly heavy. It was exactly what we were looking for, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase, just as good as the first purchase!
customer_reviews.text: They held up as well as possible with very frequent use all year long, not just when raining. I only needed to replace four of the seven I purchased last May and the other three are still in good condition. They are inexpensive umbrellas and I feel they are a very good product for the use we get out of them and they will definitely last much longer for those that use them only seasonally.
customer_reviews.author: Watergirl2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella. Easy to maneuver and provides coverage for me and my three ducklings (children).
customer_reviews.author: DP Family

customer_reviews.title: Not High Quality
customer_reviews.text: We were disappointed with the quality of this umbrella. One of the supports' pins fell out after a little while, and I had to gerry rig a small wire to fix it. The sewing also seems to be of modest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as wide as advertised, but wide enough, I guess..
customer_reviews.author: Cog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is big enough that it covers even my backpack. Holds up to the wind as well
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Jo

customer_reviews.title: i like
customer_reviews.text: i like it but i would rather one that has 2 layers for wind but its a well built umbrella but i would recommend for the price i spent more the the other layer
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Umbrellas!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is beautiful, sturdy, it is big, but not too big, the fabric is really nice and they last a long time. The mechanism works effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: RSF Gabbi Gourmet

customer_reviews.title: great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: perfect large umbrella to keep by the front door to run out in a rain storm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and has good coverage. Not used in the rain yet so I cannot comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: silverdove13

customer_reviews.title: Classic Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. Sturdy. Large, but not unwieldy. Great protection from the rain. Seemingly well-made. I just hope I don't accidentally leave it somewhere because I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Deskins

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandpa as a Christmas gift - I am not sure how he likes it - since it's been snowing not raining here!!! With all the positive reviews that I read about this - I believe it will just fine - and for under $20 and self open - why wouldnt he like it?
customer_reviews.author: Happygirl7887

customer_reviews.title: Humongous
customer_reviews.text: Its huge. Makes me feel like a dwarf. LOL Fits 3 medium built adults easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nishachar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very large awesome umbrella! I wanted a larger umbrella and i absolutely got what i wished for!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella for golfing, and chauffeuring the wifey around. It works great for both! I have used it for over a month, and have had no issues with this umbrella. Great budget big / golf umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: rayinchicago

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big. Unbroken to date after a lot of use over a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. The release trigger in the handle makes for a smooth opening.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great family umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a great family size umbrella. It covers me and my three kids completely. Made with pretty decent material good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: The handle makes his whole umbrella look very cheap. Besides that it functions well, I'd recommend something a little nicer if you plan to use this for business occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy enough for everyday usage. Nice wood handle and it comes with a protective sleeve. Will probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Big Perm

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It seems very well built and it feels good and balanced when holding in hand. Only time could tell its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Returning this one on the same day it arrived. ...
customer_reviews.text: Returning this one on the same day it arrived. The first time it was opened, it broke. The mechanism is obviously cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Nice large umbrella but the weight makes it more suitable for a man
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice sized umbrella but a little heavy for me but I can deal with that - unfortunately there was a large gouge in the wooden handle which is unsightly in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: tlcpony

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Quality .. Great Price on Golf Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Overall Good Quality .. Great Price for this Golf Umbrella .. Used the umbrella several times without any problems .. Seems sturdy enough even windy occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: Stay Dry.
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping you dry. Two people can stay dry under it. Excellent for what you need on a rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zaccone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size umbrella. It's always in the trunk of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good size umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Good size and well worth it the money. Does work well to keep you dry offering good cover. I would recommend it as a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: IT IS NICE & BIG COVERS MY WHOLE BDY JUS WUT I NEED I LIKE ALOT I HOPE IT LAST A LNG TIME THANX
customer_reviews.author: T K N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BIG umbrella for us larger people. Must have, if ya ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Wildstar

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This item is well-constructed. It spreads to a large enough diameter to keep you dry when the rain is blowing a bit to the side. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Barhorst

customer_reviews.title: Bumbershoot
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. Must be dexterous & strong of arm. Do not give it to Grannie. Barring this, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie  Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Have grandsons who play golf and this is what they wanted. They were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: roberta whyburn

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product 10 stars if possible. Comparable umbrellas at local retail stores are $35.00 PLUS. Highly recommend & confident I will be ordering more ...... For myself & Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, its big and easy to open or close.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Works great, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Those flimsy black umbrellas that only cover 80% of your body says "this is a just-in-case umbrella". This umbrella shows that you're prepared! With this baby, you'll be laughing as you plow through others with inferior umbrellas. I saw myself in the reflection of a building one day and laughed at how substantial this thing looked. It's quite nice. The only bad thing is, while waiting for crosswalks, you start wondering if you're obligated to share with the person next to you who's getting wet. Good thing those lights change quickly though, because before you have time to process those thoughts and take action, it's time to walk!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was just what I needed for walking in the rain with my kids. It is large and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. Broke the first time we tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Broke the first time we tried to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this.Good quality at a very low price
customer_reviews.author: Maine customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part is the push button release
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part is the push button release. Not to fond of the wood handle but it keeps me dry.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The item was defective when I received item. Thank God for Amazon return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi's Girls

customer_reviews.title: Good size umbrella perfect for watching kids sports on a rainy day
customer_reviews.text: I chose this sized umbrella specifically for watching kids' sports on a rainy day. Not only will it cover me but also a couple of kids. It seems to work well and I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I live in a country where it's not easy to find a good quality umbrella, but then they do not cost much ($2-8). So I bought two of these and had them shipped. What a disappointment!. Both handles were not glued in place, that is they pull right off the shaft. One of the spoke tips broke in half first time it was used. I cannot recommend these at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Whittier

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Golf Umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has only been used one time, but it did the job, and it looks nice. It seems to be fairly sturdy, and well-made, but only time (and more rain and wind) will tell. If any additional details become available with continued use, I will update. Update:Have used it three times in rain and wind. Works just fine. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: simonizer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unbrella for the golf course.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the rain off even in out unannounced downpours! It didn't fold up in the strong winds or turn inside out.
customer_reviews.author: James R Glass

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality umbrella for the price. Arrived quickly in a giant tube like box with plenty of protection. The only thing I didnt like is the fact that the wooden handle had a small crack/split in the wood and a bunch of scratches. Figured it would be worth mentioning but its really not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally having rain in drought stricken CA and it covers my dog and I in much needed walks
customer_reviews.author: dorothy fest

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella broke the first time I used it. In addition, the plastic frame ripped through the material.
customer_reviews.author: TKC

customer_reviews.title: The Hipster Spies With His Little Eye----Utter Trash
customer_reviews.text: Sorry useless thing! The handle came off the first time I took it out on a rainy day. Better umbrellas can be had, at a lower price, in my local drugstore. Returning this junkheap by post represents a difficult logistical problem. So I'll try to fix it with Crazy Glue, & hope for the best. The Hipster Gives It A Thumbs Down!
customer_reviews.author: The Mystic Eye Of The Hipster

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the first use, the release latch broke free and gashed my hand when I tried to open it the 2nd time
customer_reviews.author: Tipper T

customer_reviews.title: very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Enough yo cover from sun and rain, great umbrella, love it
customer_reviews.author: oscar jose rodriguez alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for dad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who loves to attend sporting events as well as fish. He uses this to both sheild himself from the sun and the rain. We, as a family, were out taking pictures and seeing some sights when it started to downpour. We fit THREE adults under this umbrella. Nice size, and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Nice large umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I am a large person and need a large umbrella, especially when I am walking with my wife. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: EMA39

customer_reviews.title: Used this a few times and love it
customer_reviews.text: Giant umbrella, nice shape, works well, especially in heavy rain and some wind. Haven't experienced super-high winds yet, which is the only reason I'd give it 4 stars. I suspect, based on my experience with moderate winds that it could become difficult to handle
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great golf umbrella for the price. Skip the branded, high-cost ones and go for the large durable kind. Not recommended for extreme windy days because this would become a javelin.
customer_reviews.author: Bester

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product several times in the last month and will continue to use in the upcoming rainy months ahead. Keeps me and my dog dry.
customer_reviews.author: LJOsteen

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: It is not great, but also not very bad. However, I wouldn't say it is worth the price. not bad.
customer_reviews.author: sangay

customer_reviews.title: Best....umbrella... ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy at 6'6 and 275lbs, so I need a decent and large umbrella to cover my head and body. This is THAT umbrella. It doesn't get any sturdier than this! Plus, the white and navy blue are a perfect contrast. Never get wet again!
customer_reviews.author: Hipzilla702

customer_reviews.title: Ok Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Like it, easy to open and of good quality. JD
customer_reviews.author: eom

product_meta.title: All-Weather GFUM60NWLT Elite Series Navy White Auto Open Golf Umbrella, 60"
product_meta.description: Wind, rain, or sunshine, the All-Weather Elite Series 60" Auto-Open Golf Umbrella opens to a full 60 inches, giving you protection from all the elements. Take it to the beach, the game, golfing, or for a slow, afternoon walk. Navy and white panels combine for a pop of color. Features fiberglass shaft and ribs; wood handle; and storage sleeve. Limited lifetime.
feature_bullets: ALL WEATHER UMBRELLA: The Elite Series 60 Golf Umbrella offers protection from wind, rain and the hot sun. No matter the weather or situation you find yourself in, this great umbrella will serve your outdoor needs for weather protection.

USE IT EVERYWHERE: A perfect umbrella for the golf course, it also works great for trips to the beach, walks in the rain or those quick dashes from the car to the office. Take it everywhere and be prepared for any weather situation that may arise.

DURABLE FLEXIBILITY: The All Weather, Elite Series 60 Golf Umbrella is built with fiberglass shaft and ribs for long lasting strength, flexibility, and durability. The flexibility helps to add to the wind protection this great umbrella provides.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
